mdRecord.dcterms:title: Original journals of the Lewis and Clark Expedition, 1804-1806: printed from the original manuscripts in the library of the American Philosophical Society and by direction of its committee on historical documents / together with manuscript material of Lewis and Clark from other sources, including note-books, letters, maps, etc., and the journals of Charles Floyd and Joseph Whitehouse, now for the first time published in full and exactly as written; ed., with introduction, notes, and index, by Reuben Gold Thwaites
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Book Traces Project.
Clark, William, 1770-1838
Floyd, Charles, -1804
Lewis, Meriwether, 1774-1809
Thwaites, Reuben Gold, 1853-1913
Whitehouse, Joseph, approximately 1775-approximately 1860
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Vols. 1-2 have date 1904; vols. 3-8 have date 1905.

Vol. 8 has title: Atlas accompanying the original journals of the Lewis and Clark expedition, 1804-1806, being facsimile reproductions of maps chiefly by William Clark ... Now for the first time published, from the original manuscripts, together with a modern map of the route ...
"Bibliographical data," by V. H. Palsits, v. 1. p. lxi-xciii.
Photocopy. Charlottesville, VA : University of Virginia Preservation-Acquisitions Dept., 1996.
Subject entries from the Provenance Evidence Thesaurus describe copies analyzed by Book Traces @ UVA.
Item X000464625 has bookplate data: Byrd Library. Item X006172542 has bookplate data: Byrd Library. Item X000299231 has bookplate data: Byrd Library. Item X000299228 has bookplate data: Byrd Library.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lewis and Clark Expedition (1804-1806)
